name: Double Barrel High Recoil
description:
Play Download version for better performance.

Use your shotgun to escape from zombies. (Well, you won't kill any zombie,  just story :P)

Shooting with your shotgun gives you speed.

You can use two different ammo, Buckshot, and Slug.

Buckshot(Red one) shoots multiple bullets, short range, low recoil.

Slug(Blue one) shoots one big bullet, long range, high recoil.

This game is just getting over it but SHOTGUN.

A and D - Move left and right.

Left click - Shoot.

R - Reload.

Q - Change ammo type.

F - PET DOG. (IMPORTANT)

Mini Jam 117: Ghosts
